Title: Relates to the minimum requirements for a quorum
Summary: Relates to the minimum requirements for a quorum; establishes there shall be no less than a majority of the total number of members of the commission in order to transact any business, perform any duty or exercise any power.
LawCode: Amd ยง11, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the minimum requirements for a quorum
